p: A total of 904 OTUs were detected in 1,426,724 sequences, although one library from the control group could not be amplified. When Î± diversity (Chao 1 index: richness, Shannon index: evenness) in all hen groups was compared, the Chao1 index was found to be significantly higher in the treatment groups than in the control group ( p < 0.05), but the Shannon index was similar among groups ( Figure 1).
